mapper.select: select budget.*,company.company_name as companyName from sys_budget_details as budget left JOIN sys_company as company on budget.company_id=company.company_id where 1=1 and budget.status_code!=2 and budget_id = #{budgetId}
select budget_id from sys_budget_details where 1=1 and status_code!=2 and year = #{year} and month = #{month} and company_id=#{companyId}
select group_concat(distinct month ORDER BY month asc)as monthInfo from sys_accounts_receivable WHERE 1=1 and status_code!=2 and `year`= #{year}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_budget_details (year, month, budget_income, real_income,budget_profits,real_profits,budget_expenses,personnel_cost,administrative_cost,material_cost ,energy_cost,equipment_cost,cleaning_cost,afforest_cost,order_maintenance_cost,community_activities_cost,other_cost,real_expenses_total,create_time,company_id) VALUES (#{year},#{month},#{budgetIncome},#{realIncome},#{budgetProfits},#{realProfits},#{budgetExpenses},#{personnelCost},#{administrativeCost},#{materialCost} ,#{energyCost},#{equipmentCost},#{cleaningCost},#{afforestCost},#{orderMaintenanceCost},#{communityActivitiesCost},#{otherCost},#{realExpensesTotal},#{createTime},#{companyId})
mapper.update: update sys_budget_details set status_code=2 where budget_id = #{budgetId}
